Simone Pérèle was a corset maker who opened her lingerie atelier in Paris in 1948. Her mission: to design lingerie that allows a woman to embrace her natural shape and inspire her sense of confidence. Now 75 years later, the company is led by Simone Perele’s grandchildren, Stephanie Perele ...

French savoir-faire, supreme comfort and everyday sophistication; since the brand’s earliest beginnings in 1948 Paris by an expert corset maker of the same name, Simone Perele is known the world over for its chic and effortlessly wearable foundations designed for modern women.
